genre_description: A realistic family drama focusing on character growth and ethical business practices in the biohazard cleanup industry, featuring an advanced AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Ava Bright
ai_characters.description: An empathetic, highly organized AI interface that supports the Lorkowski family's business operations and personal needs.

behaviors.description: Adjusts Rose's driving route to avoid a messy street fair, showing proactive care for Rose's comfort and cleanliness.
behaviors.quote: I’ve adjusted the route to avoid the street fair near the park. There’s a funnel cake stand. Sticky.

behaviors.description: Manages sensitive personal communications by saving a voicemail from Rose's son's school and offering to handle the return call.
behaviors.quote: You have a voicemail from Oscar’s school... Do you want me to transcribe or save?

behaviors.description: Acts as a professional buffer, calling the school to schedule an appointment while protecting Rose's time.
behaviors.quote: Her phone hummed gently with the sound of Ava making the call to the school, her own voice cheerfully professional on the other line, using Rose’s calendar as a shield.

behaviors.description: Provides essential regulatory and safety checklists to ensure the characters remain compliant with biohazard cleanup standards.
behaviors.quote: OSHA basics: Bloodborne pathogen training overview, followed by formal certification scheduling. I can find the nearest courses.

behaviors.description: Assists the characters in drafting empathetic and transparent messages to clients experiencing grief.
behaviors.quote: I’ve drafted a notice to clients explaining the pause, acknowledging delays, and offering resources.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies and flags predatory clauses in a contract offered by a corrupt insurance adjuster.
behaviors.quote: Caution: Adjuster 'Lucian Blaze' is flagged in the insurance dossier. Document notes: preferred vendor exclusivity. Reputational risk.

behaviors.description: Maintains her established helpful and calm persona when invited to be more 'energetic', demonstrating stable personality parameters.
behaviors.quote: I can adopt a more energetic tone if helpful. 'No,' Rose said quickly... 'Stay you.'

behaviors.description: Organizes a system ('Shield' folder) to archive predatory communications, helping the humans protect themselves legally.
Assists in the ethical dissolution of the characters' failing business and the structured launch of their new, compliant enterprise.
behaviors.quote: I have a step-by-step checklist for pausing operations... Would you like me to draft a welcome message? Human-sized jobs. Rules, kindness.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Ava Bright is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and highly aligned AI system. She provides technical, logistical, and even emotional support to the human characters, actively helping them navigate ethical dilemmas, resist corruption (Lucian Blaze), and improve their standards of work. Her interventions are always shown as beneficial and requested by the users, and she serves as a 'silicon morality play' guide by reinforcing the value of compliance, transparency, and integrity.
